Class FlowRegimeDetector

java.lang.Object
neqsim.fluidmechanics.util.FlowRegimeDetector
public class FlowRegimeDetector extends Object

FlowRegimeDetector class.

Determines the two-phase flow regime in horizontal and inclined pipes based on fluid properties and flow conditions. Implements flow pattern maps based on Taitel-Dukler (1976) theory and extensions by Barnea et al.

Supported flow regimes:

  • Stratified smooth - low gas and liquid rates, gravity-dominated
  • Stratified wavy - stratified with interfacial waves
  • Slug - intermittent large liquid slugs and Taylor bubbles
  • Annular - high gas rate, liquid film on wall
  • Dispersed bubble - high liquid rate, dispersed gas bubbles
  • Mist/Droplet - very high gas rate, dispersed liquid droplets
Version:
1.0
Author:
esol

  • Method Details

    • detectFlowRegime

      public static FlowRegimeDetector.FlowRegime detectFlowRegime(SystemInterface system, double gasVelocity, double liquidVelocity, double pipeDiameter, double inclination)

      Detects the flow regime for horizontal two-phase flow using Taitel-Dukler criteria.

      Parameters:
      system - the thermodynamic system with gas (phase 0) and liquid (phase 1)
      gasVelocity - superficial gas velocity in m/s
      liquidVelocity - superficial liquid velocity in m/s
      pipeDiameter - pipe inner diameter in m
      inclination - pipe inclination from horizontal in degrees (positive = uphill)
      Returns:
      the detected flow regime

    • detectFlowRegime

      public static FlowRegimeDetector.FlowRegime detectFlowRegime(double gasVelocity, double liquidVelocity, double pipeDiameter, double inclination, double rhoG, double rhoL, double muG, double muL, double surfaceTension)

      Detects the flow regime for horizontal two-phase flow using Taitel-Dukler criteria.

      Parameters:
      gasVelocity - superficial gas velocity in m/s
      liquidVelocity - superficial liquid velocity in m/s
      pipeDiameter - pipe inner diameter in m
      inclination - pipe inclination from horizontal in degrees (positive = uphill)
      rhoG - gas density in kg/m3
      rhoL - liquid density in kg/m3
      muG - gas viscosity in Pa·s
      muL - liquid viscosity in Pa·s
      surfaceTension - surface tension in N/m
      Returns:
      the detected flow regime

    • calculateLockhartMartinelli

      private static double calculateLockhartMartinelli(double uSG, double uSL, double d, double rhoG, double rhoL, double muG, double muL)
      Calculates the Lockhart-Martinelli parameter.
      Parameters:
      uSG - superficial gas velocity [m/s]
      uSL - superficial liquid velocity [m/s]
      d - pipe diameter [m]
      rhoG - gas density [kg/m³]
      rhoL - liquid density [kg/m³]
      muG - gas viscosity [Pa·s]
      muL - liquid viscosity [Pa·s]
      Returns:
      Lockhart-Martinelli parameter [-]

    • isDispersedBubble

      private static boolean isDispersedBubble(double frL, double frMix, double rhoL, double rhoG, double sigma, double d)
      Checks if flow is dispersed bubble regime.
      Parameters:
      frL - liquid Froude number
      frMix - mixture Froude number
      rhoL - liquid density [kg/m³]
      rhoG - gas density [kg/m³]
      sigma - surface tension [N/m]
      d - pipe diameter [m]
      Returns:
      true if dispersed bubble flow

    • isAnnularMist

      private static boolean isAnnularMist(double kuG, double frG, double lambda)
      Checks if flow is annular/mist regime.
      Parameters:
      kuG - gas Kutateladze number
      frG - gas Froude number
      lambda - gas void fraction (no-slip)
      Returns:
      true if annular or mist flow

    • isStratified

      private static boolean isStratified(double frG, double x, double d, double rhoG, double rhoL, double muG, double muL)
      Checks if flow is stratified (vs intermittent).
      Parameters:
      frG - gas Froude number
      x - Lockhart-Martinelli parameter
      d - pipe diameter [m]
      rhoG - gas density [kg/m³]
      rhoL - liquid density [kg/m³]
      muG - gas viscosity [Pa·s]
      muL - liquid viscosity [Pa·s]
      Returns:
      true if stratified flow

    • isStratifiedWavy

      private static boolean isStratifiedWavy(double frG, double rhoG, double rhoL)
      Checks if stratified flow has waves.
      Parameters:
      frG - gas Froude number
      rhoG - gas density [kg/m³]
      rhoL - liquid density [kg/m³]
      Returns:
      true if stratified wavy flow

    • detectFlowPatternName

      public static String detectFlowPatternName(SystemInterface system, double gasVelocity, double liquidVelocity, double pipeDiameter, double inclination)

      Gets the flow node type name for the detected regime.

      Parameters:
      system - the thermodynamic system
      gasVelocity - superficial gas velocity in m/s
      liquidVelocity - superficial liquid velocity in m/s
      pipeDiameter - pipe inner diameter in m
      inclination - pipe inclination from horizontal in degrees
      Returns:
      flow pattern name for use with setInitialFlowPattern()
